name: Welco
description: A Flutter mobile application for the company Welco, allows users to use their homes as parcel delivery points, providing an innovative solution.
missions: Maintained and optimized legacy code, addressed multiple bugs
Improved scan functionality success rate, and enhanced user experience
Added new features based on Figma design specifications.

name: FTL Express
description: A company homepage serves as a platform for customers to gain insights into our services and products, while also offering a cost estimation feature, enhancing the overall customer experience.
missions: Precisely implementing the Figma design specifications
Engaging in client communication and meeting their requirements.

name: TWMS
description: A warehouse management system designed to facilitate the processes of inbound, processing, and outbound parcel operations for company warehouse personnel, ensuring data traceability throughout the workflow.
missions: Maintained and optimized legacy code, enhancing component architecture for improved readability and scalability.
Developed new features, ensuring code quality and conducting functional testing.
Collaborated closely with the product team, backend developers, and UI/UX designer.
